txt.en: 'In my grandfather's time they used to mine in the tunnels beneath Emyn Ernil. But then a great rock slide happened. Many perished and the entrance was sealed up. Only recently have we found ourselves with a pressing need to open them again.\n\n'There should still be ore to be found within the tunnels. With some of it we can make some more weapons and armour to defend ourselves. Head to the tunnels beneath Emyn Ernil and try to find some leftover ore.'
Emyn Ernil was home to a thriving mining operation in past generations. Remnants and leftovers may still be found within the twisting tunnels.
'We likely won't be able to get more than a sword out of this amount, but that is one more weapon than we have now.'
Ore may be found in the tunnels beneath Emyn Ernil.\n\nGelloth asked you to venture beneath Emyn Ernil and try to find ore within the tunnels.
Gelloth can be found in Dol Amroth.\n\nGelloth will be pleased to process the ore you found beneath Emyn Ernil.
